fields.label: Who inspired/referred you to apply for the District Council 2022-23
Define Rotaract in the most efficient way
What do you expect to experience from this opportunity?
What motivates you to be a part of the council?

fields.description: (This Section is mandatory and ensures that your club President 22-23 is aware and okay with you working on the Council Team)
fields.label: No-Objection Certificate from Club

fields.default:
As President 22-23 of the applicant's home club have no objection for him/her to represent the District Council Member and it would be an honour for the club to have him/her serve on the district body.

As part of the responsibility, we understand that our club member will have to prioritize and balance the activities  of district and club and in certain situation make an informed decision.

Only applicable in case of club change :-

As President 21-22 of the applicant's Rotaract Club we have no objection for him/her to change the Rotaract Club for the year 22-23 and wish the applicant the best in their future endeavours.

(*If the President Elect is not announced, then the signature of the President 21-22 is compulsory,
If the President 21-22 of the Club is the applicant, AND the President-Elect is not announced, signature of the Immediate Past President is compulsory.)
fields.label: No Objection Certificate
I certify that the information shared above is true to my knowledge
Tell us 2 Projects you wish to be a chairperson for?
